diacheck.java.libs.imageTools

Class ControlFieldReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • diacheck.java.libs.imageTools.ControlFieldReader

  • public class ControlFieldReader
extends java.lang.Object
    ControlFieldReader is created solely for the purpose of finding control fields in a sample image and read the position and orientation of those fields.
    Author:
    Anton Österberg

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlFieldReader(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageData) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Point[] findControlFields()
      Finds all three control fields, but without knowing which field is which.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlFieldReader

        public ControlFieldReader(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageData)
        Parameters:
        imageData - Takes a BufferedImage instance of the sample image.

    • Method Detail

      • findControlFields

        public java.awt.Point[] findControlFields()
        Finds all three control fields, but without knowing which field is which.
        Returns:
        returns an array of three Point objects, each one representing the position of a control field.

      • getBottomControlField

        public java.awt.Point getBottomControlField()
        Returns:
        returns the position of the bottom control field.

      • getLeftControlField

        public java.awt.Point getLeftControlField()
        Returns:
        returns the position of the left control field.

      • getRightControlField

        public java.awt.Point getRightControlField()
        Returns:
        returns the position of the right control field.

      • readAligment

        public double readAligment()
        Reads the alignment of the image.
        Returns:
        returns the alignment of the image in radians, where a positive value indicates a clockwise rotation and negative value counter clockwise rotation.
